item.description:
Bill and Dwan Twyford

present

The Bankruptcy Shortsale Thru NLP

 

Learn about short sales and bankruptcy from experts Bill & Dwan Twyford!This is a great opportunity to learn what is working right now in the world of foreclosures, pre-foreclosures, short sales, bank REO and other proven money making strategies that investors are using right now across the country. 

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 pm, Thursday, March 15, 2012

Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston

free for members; $25 for non-membersfree parking
